DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate long-term safety of etanercept in patients with rheumatoid arthritis who successfully have completed open-label safety study 0881A1-301-EU
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Etanercept in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Completed Trial 0881A1-301-EU in Spain
DOC.criteria: To have completed 0881A1301EU study in Spain Clinical diagnosis by ACR revised criteria of rheumatoid arthritis. Hypersensibility to etanercept or any of its components Significant concurrent medical disease
